ygData.subject: Powering Up
ygData.msgSnippet: Deep within a completely dark structure a sudden light golden hue lightened up the room just a little, which turns out to be a large cavern.  A cavern

Subject: Powering Up
To: nbwrpg@egroups.com

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: CompuServe 2000 32-bit sub 107
From: KSLawdogg@...




Deep within a completely dark structure a sudden light golden hue lightened 
up the room just a little, which turns out to be a large cavern.  A cavern 
somewhere in a volcano.  The golden pyramid is about a little over a dozen 
feet in height and twenty feet in diameter.  The ancient device began racing 
as it starting coming online.

How long had it been out?  It had been damaged somehow, possibly an 
earthquake.  An estimated five thousand years perhaps.  It couldn't do 
anything as its advanced sensors told it.  Its power was only at fifteen 
percent.  For now it would just have to dip into its cold fusion reactor 
which had been damaged.   Procedure Soe Level One would have to be initiated 
when energy was restored.  Then procedure Chasm Level One would have to take 
effect after that.  Then it would be strong enough to initiate its main 
objectives.  For now it could only scan, and that's what it did.  Very 
intense and thorough scans on what it could.  Some things the golden pyramid 
didn't have the energy to scan because of shields.  Others had their shields 
down and weapons fire was going off.  No unity, no togetherness.  Just how 
everything was supposed to go.
